tab1.text1:
Thank you for joining!

Make sure to join the Discord server for important info and updates - discord.gg/addpSvUAmX

Press F1 to open the shop on PC

Hold X on XBOX or Square on PS5 for the shop

You automatically gain 250 points every 15 minutes

All supply drops have element in them. Have fun!

tab2.text1:
Rule #1 - No hacking, meshing, or exploiting bugs. No mesh structures.

Rule #2 - Keep structure spam to a minimum, no excessive griefing.

Rule #3 - No slurs or offensive content of any kind in tribe names, player names, tame names, or anywhere else.

Rule #4 - Don't take an excessive amount of base spots, keep it down to 1 cave per group.

Rule #5 - Don't destroy/transfer loot if you are being raided.
tab2.text2:
Rule #6 - Don't build turrets at spawn areas or on obelisks.

Rule #7 - Don't use more than 3 active soakers at a time (to prevent excessive lag).

Rule #8 - Never inside your tribe/group Rule #9 No extreme toxicity, racism, or offensive discussions of any kind.

Rule #10 Inactive FOBs can't be left up for more than 12 hours.
